title: Travelers Profit Falls 20% on Hurricane Ida, Auto Claims
sub_head: Property-casualty insurer posts quarterly income of $662 million
body:
Property-casualty insurer Travelers Cos. posted a 20% decline in net income in the third quarter, weighed down by storm damage and car-wreck related claims.
Travelers is among the largest issuers of insurance to U.S. businesses, and it sells car and home insurance to individuals and families.
